content.description: Sit start on jugs, top out on slopers.
content.location: Starts on the left hand jugs at  the end of the obvious rail across the center of the boulder

content.description: Sit start from the rightmost point of the central ledge on the Shore Dinner boulder.   Traverse using foot chips and a heel hook to the lefthand juggy top-out of Clamcakes Direct.   A really fun line, with solid holds (unlike some other spots at RP that are still cleaning up.).  Feels like V1 some days and V2 others-- not sure of the grade.   Good level landing.
content.location: See pic of the Shore Dinner Boulder

content.description: Pull off the ground using two small sharp crimps, low to the ground on the left side of the boulder and a large right foot out right, bump the right out to a thin crimp and then move straight up either left or right to a set of crimps above that first hold, from here match up and then make an easy reach up to the lip and top out straight up.
content.location: Left side of the Cherrystone boulder, can be seen from the trail if you park inside Rocky Point Park and not at the dirt lot.

content.description: Enter a description of this area.
